page.title: 08Cults Primary School
page.content: Cults Primary can provide accommodation for over 750 pupils.This school was first occupied in August 1974.Pupils come from Aberdeen district but mostly children from Cults and Bieldside areas come to this school.There are three open plan teaching units the red,blue and greenof which each can hold up to 7 classes.There is one head teacher and 2 assistant head teachers,one who has responsibility for P1-P3 and the other from P4-P7.The school has a library resource centre ,games hall,dining room,medical room and storage facilities.Our school provides lunches and has a coffee-bar.The presant roll of the school is about 440.
